1375.name: OA 350
1375.Applications: 320-390 HB, hardfacing and rebuilding alloy for wornout wheels, rails, tracks, tires, conveyors, crossings, bufferlayers prior to hardfacing. Excelent wear and abrasion resistance against heavy impact and shock, good machinable with carbide tools
1375.Suitable_For: Rails repair, crossings, concrete bars, crane, railway and tram tracks, conveyors and transport surfaces, tires, bucket and loader teeth, cruscher jaws, bufferlayers etc.
